Authors:
Marc Pignal, Roxana Yockteng, David J. Hearn, Jean-Noel
Labat
Title:
Adenia barthelatii (Passifloraceae), a new endemic species of
Mayotte and its phylogenetic status within the genus Adenia
Abstract:
Morphological characters support the description of a new
species of Passifloraceae from Mayotte Island: Adenia barthelatii M.
Pignal, Yockteng, Hearn & Labat. Morphological and molecular data
suggest that A. barthelatii belongs to the ‘warty-gland’ subclade of
Clade V defined by Hearn elsewhere. Since the warty-gland clade is
restricted to the Malagasy region we suggest a Malagasy origin of this
Maorian species of Adenia.
